title: Iadegbola34
author: Iadegbola34
content: You'd see some exceptional women tag themselves "king", but no exceptional man tags himself queen."Happy Father's Day to my mother.""The Woman King."There's no "The Man Queen."Does it mean everyone unanimously accepts that the symbol of power and authority is a man?This tweet came across my timeline, I gave it a thought (maybe there was little to think about anyways) and agree with the contents. I decided to share it with people on here to see if it's actually controversial as people make it to be on the actual tweet.For reference: https://twitter.com/PenTitan/status/1581684090755239937?t=oJWZ8ffiYi6-LZvtadWh5w&s=19
